BADGE.early_supporter.description.colori.en-US: [grey][era_purple][ARROW] One of the first [gold_gradient](financial) supporters of [eramc_gradient]EraMC!

BADGE.community_ambassador.description.de-DE: Jemand der sich besonders für die Community engagiert.
BADGE.community_ambassador.description.en-US: Someone who is particularly engaged in the community.
